content: in this legal case there is a dispute between two parties referred to as z division and al division regarding the division of common property al filed a lawsuit requesting the division of real estate a vehicle and a loan agreement as well as compensation from vz the court issued an interim decision stating that the joint assets belong to both parties and rejected vzs request to cancel the action guarantee measure the defendant believes the property in question is part of the joint assets and requests a new decision the district court reviewed the appeal and found that the county courts decision was justified the court concludes that the property belongs to both parties as joint assets and denies the defendants request to cancel the guarantee action the proceedings have been terminated and the distribution of procedural costs will be determined based on the decision to terminate the procedure

metadata.marital_regime: issues relatively division of common properties
